channel.title: Who would be interested in this?
channel.description:
Hey, I'm not sure if anyone's offered this before as I haven't been known for hanging around moparscape a lot in the past.
Would anyone be interested in a purely rs-private-server host? IE, a dedicated network of machines with a decent connection which you could host your server on, instead of hosting yourself at home.
What would this mean for your server? High speeds and always-online without you having to look after a machine. I would also be providing a control panel to restart/make changes to your server, so that you wouldn't have to mess with command-line stuff. This service would not be free however, as it would be using servers that I'm also using for other things, and I need to cover the costs. I would keep it cheap, though.
Thoughts?

item.title: Who would be interested in this?
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

Hmm… sounds interesting.

How much, estimated, would the price be?

Read full topic
